```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sqlalchemy import create_engine
import os.path
```

```{python}
db = create_engine('sqlite:///sensitive/main.db')
```

```{python}
query = """
SELECT * FROM churches
"""
```

```{python}
pd.read_sql(query, db)
```

